provider_integration.user_settings_used: VERIFIED - all three provider categories use getUserProviderSettings()
provider_integration.usage_tracking: VERIFIED - latency and success metrics logged

error_handling.provider_failures: VERIFIED - graceful fallback to backup providers
error_handling.partial_data: VERIFIED - continues analysis with available data

expected_execution_trace.analysis_pipeline: OHLC + indicators → accuracy calculation → signal generation

performance_characteristics.expected_latency: 5-15 seconds per symbol depending on provider response times
performance_characteristics.caching_strategy: Results cached to avoid duplicate API calls
performance_characteristics.error_resilience: Continues with partial data if some providers fail
